author: Special Correspondent
text:
Security arrangements have been tightened in Salem Railway Junction and also in the other major railway stations in Salem Railway Division in connection with Republic Day.

The Railway Protection Force personnel checked the belongings of the passengers at all the railway stations round-the-clock.

They also checked the baggage of the passengers in the running trains.

Metal detectors have also been installed at the entry points of all the major railway stations, Railway Protection Force sources said.

Sniffer dogs were also pressed into service to find out the presence of explosive substances. The tight security arrangements will be continued till the Republic Day, the sources said.
title: Security tightened in major railway stations
